channel.title: Server is online but still can't login?
channel.description:
I have used the runelocus status checker and it says my ip is online but still when I try to login it says error connecting to server.
Anyone know what might be the problem?

item.title: Server is online but still can't login?
item.dc:creator: @pking4fam pking4fam
item.description:
@pking4fam wrote:

ooh then i have like no clue. I never had that problem before. The only thing i could think of that could be keeping you from logging in onto his server is thatthe port in the client is wrong.

Read full topic
